name: jskos-vue

scripts.yesno: node -e "const yesno = require('yesno'); yesno({ question: 'Are you sure you want to continue?' }).then(ok => process.exit(ok ? 0 : 1));"
scripts.release: test $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) = dev && git pull && npm test && npm run build && npm version $SEMVER && npm run --silent yesno && (git push && git checkout main && git merge dev && git push --follow-tags && git checkout dev) || (git tag -d $(git describe --tags) && git reset --hard HEAD~1)

author: Stefan Peters <stefan.peters@gbv.de>
description: A suite of components and plugins for Vue 3 related to JSKOS.
